data.summary_en: A sprawling shopping and entertainment complex with dynamic fountain shows and diverse dining options.
data.summary_ko: 분수 쇼와 다양한 식사 옵션을 즐길 수 있는 거대한 쇼핑 및 엔터테인먼트 복합 공간입니다.
data.ticketInfo: Free (shopping mall, individual stores/attractions have prices)
data.menuInfo: Ramen from Ramen Stadium (¥800-¥1200), Starbucks coffee (¥400-¥600), Souvenirs (¥500-¥3000)
data.travelTips: Enjoy the frequent fountain shows, explore diverse shops, and dine at the Ramen Stadium.

data.summary_en: An extensive underground shopping paradise, offering convenience and diverse retail options.
data.summary_ko: 편리함과 다양한 소매 옵션을 제공하는 광대한 지하 쇼핑 천국입니다.
data.menuInfo: Clothing items (¥2000-¥10000), cafe drinks (¥400-¥700), souvenir sweets (¥500-¥1500)
data.travelTips: A vast underground mall connecting major department stores. Great for shopping and escaping heat/rain.
data.essentialItems: Comfortable walking shoes, shopping bag, map

data.summary_en: A premier department store offering luxury brands, high-quality fashion, and an impressive food hall.
data.summary_ko: 럭셔리 브랜드, 고품질 패션, 인상적인 식품관을 제공하는 최고의 백화점입니다.
data.travelTips: Located directly above Hakata Station. Tax-free shopping available.

data.summary_en: A well-established department store in Tenjin, offering a wide range of luxury goods, fashion, and gourmet food.
data.summary_ko: 텐진에 위치한 유서 깊은 백화점으로 다양한 명품, 패션, 고급 식품을 제공합니다.
data.travelTips: Another upscale department store in the Tenjin area. Known for its selection of international brands.
data.essentialItems: Comfortable shoes for browsing, shopping list.

data.summary_en: A historical and elegant department store in Tenjin, known for its high-quality products and excellent service.
data.summary_ko: 텐진의 유서 깊고 우아한 백화점으로 고품질 제품과 훌륭한 서비스로 유명합니다.
data.menuInfo: Designer apparel (¥25,000-¥250,000), Accessories (¥5,000-¥50,000), Cosmetics (¥4,000-¥25,000), Japanese crafts (¥2,000-¥15,000)
data.travelTips: One of Fukuoka's oldest and most prestigious department stores. Great for finding unique Japanese gifts.

data.summary_en: Integrated into Hakata Station, offering a vast selection of shops, restaurants, and a charming rooftop garden.
data.summary_ko: 하카타역과 연결되어 있으며 다양한 상점, 식당, 매력적인 옥상 정원을 제공합니다.
data.menuInfo: Fashion brands (¥5,000-¥30,000), Lifestyle goods (¥1,000-¥10,000), Souvenirs (¥500-¥5,000), Dining (¥1,000-¥4,000)
data.travelTips: Part of Hakata Station, very convenient for travelers. Don't miss the rooftop garden.
data.essentialItems: Comfortable shoes, camera for the rooftop view.

data.summary_en: A sophisticated department store known for its luxury brands, elegant ambiance, and high-quality products.
data.summary_ko: 럭셔리 브랜드, 우아한 분위기, 고품질 제품으로 유명한 세련된 백화점입니다.
data.travelTips: Another high-end department store in Tenjin, known for its refined atmosphere and quality.

data.summary_en: A modern complex with trendy shops, stylish restaurants, and a cinema, conveniently located near the station.
data.summary_ko: 트렌디한 상점, 세련된 레스토랑, 영화관이 있는 현대적인 복합 단지로 역 근처에 편리하게 위치해 있습니다.
data.menuInfo: Fashion boutiques (¥4,000-¥25,000), Cafes (¥600-¥1,800), Restaurants (¥1,200-¥5,000), Lifestyle goods (¥1,000-¥8,000)
data.travelTips: Connected to Nishitetsu Fukuoka (Tenjin) Station. Good mix of fashion and dining options.

data.summary_en: A fantastic store for stationery, lifestyle goods, and unique gifts. You can easily spend hours browsing here.
data.summary_ko: 문구류, 생활용품, 독특한 선물을 위한 환상적인 상점입니다. 여기서 몇 시간이고 둘러볼 수 있습니다.
data.menuInfo: Stationery (¥300-¥5,000), Home goods (¥1,000-¥10,000), Health & Beauty (¥800-¥7,000), Travel goods (¥2,000-¥15,000)
data.travelTips: Great for unique souvenirs and practical items. Explore multiple floors for different categories.

data.summary_en: A chaotic but fun 24-hour discount store selling everything from snacks to electronics. A true Japanese shopping experience.
data.summary_ko: 과자부터 전자제품까지 모든 것을 파는 혼란스럽지만 재미있는 24시간 할인점입니다. 진정한 일본 쇼핑 경험을 할 수 있습니다.
data.travelTips: Open 24/7. A discount store known for its vast and eclectic selection. Good for late-night shopping.
data.essentialItems: Shopping list, cash/credit card, patient attitude.

data.summary_en: A vibrant fashion department store featuring trendy brands, unique boutiques, and a popular food floor.
data.summary_ko: 트렌디한 브랜드, 독특한 부티크, 인기 있는 푸드 플로어를 갖춘 활기찬 패션 백화점입니다.
data.travelTips: Popular with younger crowds. Has a good selection of trendy fashion and pop culture stores.

data.summary_en: A souvenir shop at the base of Fukuoka Tower, offering a good selection of local specialties and memorable gifts.
data.summary_ko: 후쿠오카 타워 기슭에 위치한 기념품 가게로, 다양한 지역 특산품과 기념품을 제공합니다.
data.ticketInfo: Free to enter shop (Observation deck fee ¥800)
data.travelTips: Visit after enjoying the panoramic views. Great for specific Fukuoka souvenirs.

data.summary_en: A spacious seaside outlet mall offering a wide range of brands at discounted prices, plus a Ferris wheel.
data.summary_ko: 다양한 브랜드가 할인된 가격으로 제공되는 넓은 해변 아울렛 몰이며, 관람차도 있습니다.
data.travelTips: Fukuoka's largest outlet mall by the sea. Great views of Hakata Bay.
data.essentialItems: Car or public transport tickets, comfortable shoes for walking, shopping list.

data.summary_en: A cultural complex housing a theater, art museum, and some specialty shops. Good for a more refined experience.
data.summary_ko: 극장, 미술관, 일부 전문 상점이 있는 문화 단지입니다. 좀 더 세련된 경험을 즐기기에 좋습니다.
data.menuInfo: Art galleries (entry fees vary), Specialty shops (¥5,000-¥50,000), Dining (¥1,500-¥7,000)
data.travelTips: Home to Hakataza Theater and Fukuoka Asian Art Museum. More focused on culture and niche shopping.

data.summary_en: A massive new shopping mall with diverse retail, entertainment, and a giant Gundam statue. Perfect for families.
data.summary_ko: 다양한 소매점, 엔터테인먼트, 거대한 건담 동상이 있는 대규모 신규 쇼핑몰입니다. 가족에게 완벽합니다.
data.travelTips: New large-scale shopping mall with the famous life-sized Gundam statue. Great for families.
data.essentialItems: Camera for Gundam, comfortable shoes, budget for food and fun.

data.summary_en: A historic covered shopping arcade offering traditional Japanese goods, local snacks, and souvenirs.
data.summary_ko: 전통적인 일본 상품, 지역 간식, 기념품을 제공하는 유서 깊은 지붕 있는 상점가입니다.
data.menuInfo: Souvenirs (¥300-¥3,000), Traditional crafts (¥1,000-¥10,000), Local snacks (¥200-¥1,500), Apparel (¥1,000-¥5,000)
data.travelTips: Fukuoka's oldest shopping arcade. Great for traditional Japanese goods and local treats.

data.summary_en: A fashion-focused shopping center popular with younger generations, offering the latest trends.
data.summary_ko: 젊은 세대에게 인기 있는 패션 중심 쇼핑센터로 최신 트렌드를 제공합니다.
data.menuInfo: Youth fashion (¥2,000-¥15,000), Trendy accessories (¥500-¥5,000), Cafes (¥500-¥1,200)
data.travelTips: Popular among young people for its trendy fashion stores. Easily accessible in Tenjin.
data.essentialItems: Knowledge of current fashion trends, yen.

data.summary_en: A massive complex at Hakata Station housing multiple department stores, restaurants, and entertainment.
data.summary_ko: 하카타역에 위치한 대규모 복합 단지로 여러 백화점, 식당, 엔터테인먼트 시설을 포함합니다.
data.travelTips: The entire complex around Hakata Station. Includes Amu Plaza, Hakata Hankyu, and many dining options.

data.summary_en: A shopping and dining area within Hakata Station, famous for local souvenirs (omiyage) and delicious bento boxes.
data.summary_ko: 하카타역 내 쇼핑 및 식당가로, 지역 기념품과 맛있는 도시락으로 유명합니다.
data.travelTips: Located inside Hakata Station. Perfect for last-minute souvenir shopping or grabbing a meal before a train.

data.summary_en: An upscale shopping mall offering luxury brands and specialty stores, often quieter than its bustling neighbors.
data.summary_ko: 고급 브랜드와 전문점을 제공하는 고급 쇼핑몰로, 번화한 이웃보다 조용한 경우가 많습니다.
data.travelTips: Adjacent to Canal City. Offers a more luxurious and artistic shopping experience.
data.essentialItems: A sense of appreciation for fine goods, credit card.

data.summary_en: A shop within the Kokusai Center, offering event-related goods and local Fukuoka souvenirs.
data.summary_ko: 국제 센터 내 상점으로, 행사 관련 상품과 후쿠오카 지역 기념품을 판매합니다.
data.menuInfo: Event merchandise (¥1,000-¥10,000), Fukuoka souvenirs (¥500-¥5,000), Local snacks (¥300-¥2,000)
data.travelTips: Located within the Fukuoka Kokusai Center. Shop access might be limited to event days.

data.summary_en: A multi-story store in Tenjin offering affordable fashion and various goods, popular with a younger, budget-conscious crowd.
data.summary_ko: 텐진에 있는 저렴한 패션 및 다양한 상품을 판매하는 다층 상점으로, 젊은 층과 알뜰 쇼핑객에게 인기 있습니다.
data.menuInfo: Budget fashion (¥1,000-¥8,000), Discount goods (¥300-¥3,000), Character goods (¥500-¥5,000)
data.travelTips: Great for affordable fashion and accessories. Popular among students.

data.summary_en: A massive electronics retailer with a wide selection of gadgets, cameras, and home appliances.
data.summary_ko: 가젯, 카메라, 가전제품을 다양하게 갖춘 거대한 전자제품 소매점입니다.
data.travelTips: Huge electronics store near Hakata Station. Excellent for tax-free shopping.
data.essentialItems: Shopping list, passport for tax-free, power adapter.

data.summary_en: Large electronics store in Tenjin, popular for its extensive range of electronics, cosmetics, and duty-free shopping.
data.summary_ko: 텐진의 대형 전자제품 매장으로 다양한 전자제품, 화장품, 면세 쇼핑으로 인기 있습니다.
data.menuInfo: Electronics (¥5,000-¥500,000), Beauty devices (¥3,000-¥30,000), Souvenirs (¥500-¥5,000), Pharmaceuticals (¥1,000-¥10,000)
data.travelTips: Another major electronics store in Tenjin. Good for duty-free shopping and unique Japanese gadgets.
data.essentialItems: Passport, specific product names in Japanese.

data.summary_en: A shopping area inside Hakata Station, perfect for finding local food gifts and souvenirs before departing.
data.summary_ko: 하카타역 내 쇼핑 공간으로, 출발 전에 지역 식품 선물과 기념품을 찾기에 완벽합니다.
data.menuInfo: Souvenirs (¥500-¥3,000), Local food products (¥800-¥4,000), Fashion accessories (¥1,000-¥5,000), Cafes (¥500-¥1,200)
data.travelTips: Located within Hakata Station, offering a variety of Fukuoka souvenirs and local specialties.

data.summary_en: A charming street offering a glimpse into old Hakata with traditional shops and local goods.
data.summary_ko: 전통 상점과 지역 상품으로 옛 하카타를 엿볼 수 있는 매력적인 거리입니다.
data.menuInfo: Traditional crafts (¥1,000-¥10,000), Souvenirs (¥300-¥3,000), Local snacks (¥200-¥1,500)
data.travelTips: Experience the historical charm of Hakata. Less crowded than modern malls.

data.summary_en: A large MUJI store offering a wide array of minimalist, functional, and high-quality lifestyle products.
data.summary_ko: 미니멀하고 기능적이며 고품질 라이프스타일 제품을 다양하게 제공하는 대형 무인양품 매장입니다.
data.location: Canal City Hakata, 1-2 Sumiyoshi, Hakata Ward, Fukuoka, 812-0018, Japan
data.travelTips: Discover minimalist and high-quality Japanese design products.

data.summary_en: A well-known global brand offering high-quality, functional, and affordable basic apparel for all ages.
data.summary_ko: 고품질의 기능적이고 저렴한 기본 의류를 모든 연령대에 제공하는 잘 알려진 글로벌 브랜드입니다.
data.location: 1-11-11 Tenjin, Chuo Ward, Fukuoka, 810-0001, Japan (often within Tenjin Core or similar complex)
data.travelTips: Great for comfortable and affordable everyday clothing. Tax-free shopping available.
data.essentialItems: Passport for tax-free, sizing information (Japanese sizes can differ).

data.summary_en: A popular fashion retailer known for its trendy, affordable clothing and accessories, especially popular with younger shoppers.
data.summary_ko: 트렌디하고 저렴한 의류 및 액세서리로 유명한 인기 패션 소매점으로, 특히 젊은 쇼핑객에게 인기 있습니다.
data.menuInfo: Trendy apparel (¥790-¥3,990), Accessories (¥290-¥1,490), Seasonal fashion (¥990-¥4,990)
data.travelTips: Sister brand to Uniqlo, offering even trendier and more affordable fashion.

data.summary_en: The go-to store for anime, manga, and gaming merchandise, offering a vast selection for fans.
data.summary_ko: 애니메이션, 만화, 게임 상품을 위한 필수 상점으로, 팬들을 위한 방대한 컬렉션을 제공합니다.
data.location: 2-2-43 Tenjin, Chuo Ward, Fukuoka, 810-0001, Japan (often within Solaria Plaza or similar complex)
data.travelTips: A must-visit for anime and manga fans. Look out for limited edition items.

data.summary_en: A lively arcade offering a variety of games, including numerous crane games with popular character prizes.
data.summary_ko: 다양한 게임, 특히 인기 캐릭터 상품이 있는 수많은 크레인 게임을 제공하는 활기찬 아케이드입니다.
data.ticketInfo: Free to enter (Game costs ¥100-¥500 per play)
data.menuInfo: Claw machine prizes (n/a), Arcade games (¥100 per play), Rhythm games (¥200-¥300 per play)
data.travelTips: An entertainment arcade, not traditional shopping, but offers crane games with merchandise prizes.

data.name_en: Hakata Doll & Craft Traditional Art Centre
data.name_ko: 하카타 인형 및 공예 전통 예술 센터
data.summary_en: A center dedicated to traditional Hakata dolls and crafts, offering workshops and authentic souvenirs.
data.summary_ko: 전통 하카타 인형과 공예품을 전시하고 워크숍 및 정품 기념품을 판매하는 센터입니다.
data.sourceTitle: Hakata Doll & Craft Traditional Art Centre
data.menuInfo: Hakata dolls (¥3,000-¥50,000), Traditional crafts (¥1,000-¥20,000), Souvenirs (¥500-¥5,000)
data.travelTips: Learn about traditional Hakata crafts and purchase authentic souvenirs.

data.summary_en: A peaceful urban oasis offering beautiful scenery, perfect for a leisurely escape from city life.
data.summary_ko: 후쿠오카 도심 속 휴식과 자연을 즐기기 좋은 고요한 도시 오아시스입니다.
data.menuInfo: Pedal Boat Rental (¥600/30min), Ice Cream (¥350), Coffee (¥450)
data.travelTips: Ideal for a relaxed stroll, jogging, or boat ride. Visit during cherry blossom season for stunning views.
data.essentialItems: Comfortable walking shoes, water bottle, camera

data.summary_en: Historic site offering insights into Fukuoka's past, with impressive ruins and beautiful park grounds.
data.summary_ko: 후쿠오카의 역사를 엿볼 수 있는 유적지로, 인상적인 유적과 아름다운 공원 부지를 자랑합니다.
data.menuInfo: Castle-themed souvenirs (¥500-¥1500), local snacks (¥300)
data.travelTips: Explore the remaining stone walls and enjoy panoramic views of the city from the hilltop. Best visited during cherry blossom season.

data.summary_en: A revered Shinto shrine known for its vibrant festivals and traditional architecture.
data.summary_ko: 활기찬 축제와 전통 건축물로 유명한 유서 깊은 신사입니다.
data.menuInfo: Omamori (charms, ¥500-¥1000), Ema (prayer plaques, ¥500), Goshuin (stamp, ¥300)
data.travelTips: Famous for its Hakata Gion Yamakasa floats. Try the Chikarashii-ishi (strength stone) for good luck.

data.summary_en: Offers breathtaking panoramic views of Fukuoka city and Hakata Bay, especially stunning at night.
data.summary_ko: 후쿠오카 시내와 하카타 만의 숨막히는 전경을 제공하며, 특히 밤에 아름답습니다.
data.menuInfo: Souvenir photo (¥1000), Tower mascot merchandise (¥700-¥2000), Cafe drinks (¥400-¥700)
data.travelTips: Go for sunset or evening views to see the city lights. Don't miss the Lovers' Sanctuary on the observation deck.
data.essentialItems: Camera, small change for coin binoculars

data.summary_en: A majestic shrine dedicated to learning, featuring beautiful gardens and a unique plum tree.
data.summary_ko: 아름다운 정원과 독특한 매화나무가 있는 학문의 신을 모시는 장엄한 신사입니다.
data.menuInfo: Umegae Mochi (plum cake, ¥150), Omamori (charms, ¥500-¥1200), Goshuin (stamp, ¥300)
data.travelTips: Walk along the charming Omotesando street lined with shops. Rub the head of the ox statue for intelligence.

data.summary_en: A lively local market offering a true taste of Fukuoka's fresh produce and seafood.
data.summary_ko: 후쿠오카의 신선한 농산물과 해산물을 맛볼 수 있는 활기찬 현지 시장입니다.
data.location: 1 Chome-5 Haruyoshi, Chuo Ward, Fukuoka, 810-0003, Japan
data.menuInfo: Fresh seafood sashimi (¥500-¥2000), local vegetables (¥200-¥800), street food snacks (¥300-¥700)
data.travelTips: Arrive early for the freshest seafood. Enjoy the local atmosphere and try various local delicacies.

data.summary_en: A pleasant man-made beach perfect for leisurely walks, sunbathing, and enjoying ocean views.
data.summary_ko: 여유로운 산책, 일광욕, 바다 전망을 즐기기에 완벽한 쾌적한 인공 해변입니다.
data.menuInfo: Cafe drinks (¥400-¥600), light snacks (¥300-¥700), souvenir items (¥500-¥1500)
data.travelTips: Great for relaxation, beach volleyball, and enjoying the sunset. Connects to Fukuoka Tower.

data.summary_en: Houses diverse art collections from ancient to modern, with a focus on local and Asian art.
data.summary_ko: 고대부터 현대까지 다양한 미술 컬렉션을 소장하고 있으며, 지역 및 아시아 미술에 중점을 둡니다.
data.menuInfo: Museum shop souvenirs (¥500-¥3000), cafe coffee (¥450), art prints (¥1000-¥5000)
data.travelTips: Check for special exhibitions. Located within Ohori Park, making it easy to combine visits.

data.summary_en: A tranquil and historically significant shrine, offering a peaceful retreat in the city.
data.summary_ko: 도심 속 평화로운 안식처를 제공하는 고요하고 역사적으로 중요한 신사입니다.
data.menuInfo: Omamori (charms, ¥500-¥1000), Ema (prayer plaques, ¥500), Goshuin (stamp, ¥300)
data.travelTips: One of Japan's oldest shrines, dedicated to the gods of the sea. Look for the ancient sumo ring.

data.summary_en: A magnificent temple famous for its giant reclining Buddha, offering a serene and spiritual experience.
data.summary_ko: 거대한 와불상으로 유명한 장엄한 사찰로, 고요하고 영적인 경험을 선사합니다.
data.menuInfo: Omamori (charms, ¥500-¥1000), souvenir postcards (¥200), incense sticks (¥100)
data.travelTips: Home to the world's largest bronze reclining Buddha. Wear comfortable shoes as there's a lot of walking.
data.essentialItems: Comfortable walking shoes, camera, small change for offerings

data.summary_en: Features an impressive collection of contemporary and traditional Asian art, highly recommended for art lovers.
data.summary_ko: 현대 및 전통 아시아 미술의 인상적인 컬렉션을 선보이며, 예술 애호가들에게 강력히 추천됩니다.
data.menuInfo: Museum shop souvenirs (¥500-¥3000), art books (¥1500-¥5000), cafe drinks (¥400-¥700)
data.travelTips: Focuses solely on Asian art, providing a unique cultural perspective. Located in Hakata Riverain.

data.summary_en: The oldest Zen temple in Japan, offering a tranquil atmosphere and beautiful traditional architecture.
data.summary_ko: 일본 최초의 선종 사찰로, 고요한 분위기와 아름다운 전통 건축물을 제공합니다.
data.menuInfo: Omamori (charms, ¥500-¥1000), Goshuin (stamp, ¥300), small temple souvenirs (¥300-¥800)
data.travelTips: Japan's first Zen temple. Enjoy the peaceful garden. Respect the quiet atmosphere.

data.summary_en: A historic temple housing a giant wooden Buddha statue and a fascinating interior.
data.summary_ko: 거대한 목조 불상과 매혹적인 내부를 소장하고 있는 유서 깊은 사찰입니다.
data.menuInfo: Omamori (charms, ¥500-¥1000), souvenir items (¥300-¥1500), incense sticks (¥100)
data.travelTips: Home to Fukuoka Daibutsu, a large wooden seated Buddha. Don't miss the Hell and Heaven Tour.

data.summary_en: An engaging aquarium with impressive marine life displays and exciting dolphin shows.
data.summary_ko: 인상적인 해양 생물 전시와 신나는 돌고래 쇼를 즐길 수 있는 매력적인 수족관입니다.
data.menuInfo: Aquarium souvenirs (¥800-¥3000), dolphin show tickets (included), cafe snacks (¥400-¥800)
data.travelTips: Watch the popular dolphin and sea lion shows. Located next to Uminonakamichi Seaside Park.
data.essentialItems: Comfortable shoes, camera, waterproof bag if near splash zones

data.summary_en: A expansive and beautiful park offering endless fun with flowers, animals, and recreational activities.
data.summary_ko: 꽃, 동물, 레크리에이션 활동으로 끝없는 즐거움을 선사하는 광대하고 아름다운 공원입니다.

data.travelTips: A vast park perfect for families, with playgrounds, flower gardens, and cycling paths.
data.essentialItems: Sunscreen, hat, water bottle, comfortable walking/cycling shoes

data.summary_en: A pleasant zoo and botanical garden perfect for families, featuring a wide array of animals and plants.
data.summary_ko: 다양한 동물과 식물을 특징으로 하는 가족에게 완벽한 쾌적한 동물원 및 식물원입니다.
data.menuInfo: Zoo souvenirs (¥500-¥2000), cafe lunch sets (¥800-¥1200), animal feeding experience (¥200-¥500)
data.travelTips: Combine your visit with the adjacent botanical garden. Good for families with children.

data.summary_en: Offers a glimpse into Hakata's rich history and traditional culture in a preserved folk house.

data.menuInfo: Traditional Hakata crafts (¥1000-¥5000), souvenir postcards (¥200), local sweets (¥300-¥800)

data.summary_en: A grand and historic shrine with beautiful grounds, known for its significant cultural heritage.
data.summary_ko: 아름다운 부지와 중요한 문화유산으로 유명한 웅장하고 유서 깊은 신사입니다.

data.summary_en: A beautifully maintained botanical garden with a wide variety of plants and seasonal blooms.
data.summary_ko: 다양한 식물과 계절 꽃이 있는 아름답게 관리된 식물원입니다.

data.menuInfo: Plant-themed souvenirs (¥500-¥2000), cafe drinks (¥400-¥600), flower seeds (¥300-¥500)

data.summary_en: A serene and traditional Japanese garden offering a peaceful escape and authentic tea ceremony experience.
data.summary_ko: 고요하고 전통적인 일본 정원으로, 평화로운 휴식과 정통 다도 체험을 제공합니다.
data.menuInfo: Matcha green tea set (¥300), small garden-themed souvenirs (¥300-¥800)

data.summary_en: A spacious park ideal for nature lovers, featuring historic castle ruins and stunning seasonal flowers.

data.menuInfo: Fashion items (¥3000-¥30000), restaurant meals (¥1000-¥3000), character goods (¥500-¥2000)

data.summary_en: A modern and vibrant multi-purpose stadium, home to the SoftBank Hawks baseball team.

data.travelTips: Catch a Fukuoka SoftBank Hawks baseball game for a lively atmosphere. Take a stadium tour on non-game days.

data.summary_en: An architecturally stunning museum exploring Japan's cultural ties with Asia through impressive exhibits.

data.summary_en: A traditional Japanese garden that provides a peaceful and scenic escape with historical significance.

data.summary_en: Relaxed sushi house specializing in rice bowls with seafood & veggies, plus tempura, sashimi & more.

data.summary_en: A traditional Hakata ramen shop famous for its deeply rich and flavorful tonkotsu broth.
data.summary_ko: 깊고 진한 맛의 돈코츠 육수로 유명한 전통 하카타 라멘 가게.

data.summary_en: Famous for its addictive crispy grilled chicken skin (kawayaki) and other delicious yakitori.
data.summary_ko: 중독성 있는 바삭한 닭껍질 구이(카와야키)와 맛있는 야키토리로 유명합니다.
data.menuInfo: Chicken Kawayaki (Grilled Chicken Skin) (¥200/skewer), Assorted Yakitori (¥1,500), Mentaiko Kushiyaki (¥400), Highball (¥500)
data.travelTips: Specializes in "kawayaki" (crispy grilled chicken skin), a local yakitori favorite. Order multiple skewers!

data.summary_en: A reliable choice for delicious and affordable tonkotsu ramen, popular among locals.
data.summary_ko: 맛있고 저렴한 돈코츠 라멘을 위한 믿을 수 있는 선택으로, 현지인들 사이에서 인기가 많습니다.
data.menuInfo: Classic Tonkotsu Ramen (¥780), Spicy Ramen (¥850), Fried Rice Set (¥1,100), Gyoza (¥380)
data.travelTips: A popular local ramen spot offering solid tonkotsu ramen at reasonable prices.

data.summary_en: Indulge in premium Japanese beef at this elegant steakhouse, offering perfectly grilled cuts and refined service.
data.summary_ko: 완벽하게 구워진 일본 소고기와 세련된 서비스를 제공하는 이 우아한 스테이크 하우스에서 프리미엄 일본 소고기를 즐겨보세요.
data.menuInfo: Wagyu Sirloin Steak (¥7,500), Fillet Steak (¥6,800), Garlic Shrimp (¥2,000), Seasonal Vegetable Grill (¥1,500)
data.travelTips: High-quality steakhouse with excellent cuts of Japanese beef. Reservations recommended for dinner.

data.summary_en: A vibrant robata grill where fresh ingredients are expertly cooked over charcoal, perfect for a lively evening.
data.summary_ko: 신선한 재료를 숯불에 능숙하게 구워내는 활기찬 로바타 그릴로, 활기찬 저녁에 완벽합니다.
data.menuInfo: Grilled Seasonal Fish (¥1,800), Assorted Skewers (¥2,000), Yakitori Platter (¥1,500), Local Sake (¥700)
data.travelTips: Enjoy fresh seafood and vegetables grilled over charcoal. Lively izakaya atmosphere.

data.summary_en: A beloved udon shop known for its tender noodles and flavorful broth, offering a comforting meal.
data.summary_ko: 부드러운 면발과 맛있는 육수로 유명한 인기 우동 가게로, 편안한 식사를 제공합니다.
data.menuInfo: Goboten Udon (¥700), Maruten Udon (¥650), Kashiwa Onigiri (Chicken Rice Ball) (¥200), Inari Sushi (¥150)
data.travelTips: Famous for its soft udon noodles and delicious dashi broth. Popular for a quick, affordable lunch.

data.summary_en: A lively robata grill offering delicious charcoal-grilled seafood and local delicacies in a festive atmosphere.
data.summary_ko: 축제 분위기에서 맛있는 숯불 해산물과 현지 진미를 제공하는 활기찬 로바타 그릴.
data.menuInfo: Grilled Oysters (¥1,000), Hakata Wagyu Skewers (¥700/skewer), Grilled Vegetables (¥800), Shochu (¥600)
data.travelTips: Enjoy fresh seafood and local produce grilled on a traditional robata. Lively atmosphere, great for groups.

data.summary_en: An intimate sushi counter offering an exquisite omakase experience with masterfully prepared seasonal seafood.
data.summary_ko: 장인이 준비한 제철 해산물로 절묘한 오마카세 경험을 제공하는 아늑한 스시 카운터.
data.menuInfo: Omakase Course (from ¥10,000), Seasonal Nigiri (price varies), Sashimi Platter (¥5,000), Premium Sake Pairing (¥4,000)
data.travelTips: High-end sushi experience focusing on seasonal ingredients. Reservations are essential due to limited seating.

data.summary_en: A ramen theme park with multiple regional ramen shops, offering a wide variety of flavors to explore.
data.summary_ko: 다양한 맛을 탐험할 수 있는 여러 지역 라멘 가게가 있는 라멘 테마파크.
data.location: 5F Canal City Hakata, 1-2 Sumiyoshi, Hakata Ward, Fukuoka, 812-0018 Japan
data.menuInfo: Various Ramen types from multiple shops (Avg. ¥950), Gyoza (¥400), Fried Rice (¥600)
data.travelTips: Not a single restaurant, but a food court featuring 8 different ramen shops. Great for trying various ramen styles.

data.summary_en: Enjoy perfectly fried tempura made with fresh seasonal ingredients, served hot and crispy.
data.summary_ko: 신선한 제철 재료로 완벽하게 튀겨진 바삭하고 뜨거운 튀김을 즐기세요.
data.menuInfo: Tempura Teishoku (¥1,500), Ebi Tempura (¥300/piece), Anago Tempura (¥500), Green Tea (¥200)
data.travelTips: Freshly fried tempura served course-by-course. Popular for its high quality and value.

data.summary_en: Experience authentic Hakata motsunabe at this venerable establishment, a local favorite for generations.
data.summary_ko: 수십 년간 현지인들에게 사랑받아온 이 유서 깊은 곳에서 정통 하카타 모츠나베를 경험하세요.
data.menuInfo: Motsunabe (Soy Sauce or Miso Base) (¥1,800/person), Champon Noodles (¥500), Ponzu Sauce (Free), Beer (¥600)
data.travelTips: A long-established motsunabe restaurant, known for its traditional flavors. Reservations recommended.

data.summary_en: A lively izakaya offering a diverse selection of grilled skewers and local Hakata specialties.
data.summary_ko: 다양한 꼬치구이와 현지 하카타 특선 요리를 제공하는 활기찬 이자카야.
data.menuInfo: Kushiyaki (Grilled Skewers) (¥250-¥500/skewer), Hakata Gyoza (¥600), Sashimi (¥1,200), Highball (¥500)
data.travelTips: An izakaya popular for its wide variety of kushiyaki (skewers) and local dishes. Great for evening drinks and food.

data.summary_en: Enjoy a pleasant meal with beautiful views of Ohori Park, offering a mix of Japanese and Western dishes.
data.summary_ko: 오호리 공원의 아름다운 전망과 함께 일본 및 서양 요리를 맛볼 수 있는 즐거운 식사.
data.menuInfo: Japanese Curry Rice (¥1,200), Pasta of the Day (¥1,300), Seasonal Dessert Plate (¥900), Coffee (¥500)
data.travelTips: Relaxed restaurant with views of Ohori Park. Perfect for a meal after a stroll in the park.

data.summary_en: A specialty restaurant dedicated to mentaiko, offering creative and delicious dishes featuring Fukuoka's famous delicacy.
data.summary_ko: 후쿠오카의 유명한 별미인 명란젓을 활용한 창의적이고 맛있는 요리를 선보이는 명란젓 전문점.
data.menuInfo: Mentaiko Don (Spicy Cod Roe Rice Bowl) (¥1,500), Mentaiko Tempura (¥800), Mentaiko Pasta (¥1,300), Local Beer (¥600)
data.travelTips: Specializes in various dishes using mentaiko (spicy cod roe), a Fukuoka delicacy. Great for mentaiko lovers.

data.summary_en: Enjoy premium Japanese yakiniku with excellent cuts of meat, perfect for a satisfying grilled meat feast.
data.summary_ko: 최상급 고기로 프리미엄 일본 야키니쿠를 즐기며, 만족스러운 고기 구이 잔치에 완벽합니다.
data.menuInfo: Assorted Wagyu Platter (¥6,000), Kalbi (Short Rib) (¥1,800), Harami (Outside Skirt) (¥1,500), Kimchi (¥500), Sapporo Beer (¥650)
data.travelTips: High-quality yakiniku restaurant focusing on premium Japanese beef. Reservations recommended for dinner.

data.summary_en: Experience the quintessential Fukuoka yatai culture at this bustling street food alley, offering diverse local eats.
data.summary_ko: 다양한 현지 음식을 제공하는 이 번화한 길거리 음식 골목에서 후쿠오카 야타이 문화를 경험하세요.
data.menuInfo: Tonkotsu Ramen (¥750), Oden (¥150/piece), Yakitori (¥200/skewer), Beer (¥500)
data.travelTips: Experience the quintessential Fukuoka yatai culture at this bustling street food alley, offering diverse local eats. Cash is often preferred.
